content: I am now pursuing my PhD degree in Beihang University, supervised by Prof. Wenfei Fan and Prof. Ting Deng. Prior to joining Beihang University in 2018, I completed my BSc in Computer Science at Xidian University. My research interests are focused on large-scale graph computing and their applications.

title: Ziyan Han
Keys as Features for Graph Entity Matching
